name: DuraHeat Handheld Plastic Siphon Pump - Liquid Transfer Accessory
description: The DuraHeat Plastic Siphon Pump is made for simple, hand-held operation. It is designed to help transfer kerosene, light oils and liquid soaps without spilling. Pumps up to 0.55 GPM.Designed to transfer kerosene, light oils and liquid soaps without spillingNot for use with corrosive solventsDurable, high-density plasticFlexible outlet tubeSimple, hand-held operation
